title: Ep 151: Help For Hair Loss
itunes:title: Ep 151: Help For Hair Loss
itunes:subtitle: Dr. Doris Day talks about why hair loss happens and what you can do about it. Stress management, serums, supplements, OTC and Rx drugs, lasers, platelet-rich plasma (PRP) treatments, surgery, and the best wigs—she discusses it all! Pl...
description:
Dr. Doris Day talks about why hair loss happens and what you can do about it. Stress management, serums, supplements, OTC and Rx drugs, lasers, platelet-rich plasma (PRP) treatments, surgery, and the best wigs—she discusses it all! Plus: Dove's play to change the way women are represented in media and advertising and eye creams for sensitive eyes.


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit 

Twitter: @fatmascara 

Email: info@fatmascara.com 

Website: fatmascara.com
